targets.expr:
(count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", svm=~"$SVM", isEncrypted="true"}) or vector (0))
+
(count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", svm=~"$SVM", isHardwareEncrypted="true"}) or vector (0) )

panels.description: This panel requires a cluster with ONTAP 9.10+ and the Harvest REST collector

targets.expr: ((count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", svm=~"$SVM", antiRansomwareState !="" , antiRansomwareState=~"enabled|dry_run"}) or vector (0)) / (count(volume_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", svm=~"$SVM", antiRansomwareState !=""}) or vector (1))) * 100

panels.title: Volume Anti-ransomware Status %

targets.expr:
((count(svm_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", anti_ransomware_state!="", anti_ransomware_state=~"enabled|dry_run"}) or vector (0))
/
(count(svm_labels{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", anti_ransomware_state!=""}) or vector (1))) * 100

(count(count by (datacenter, cluster) (security_account_activediruser{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 0)) + count(count by (datacenter, cluster) (security_account_ldapuser{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"} > 0))) or vector (0)

panels.description: This panel requires a cluster with ONTAP 9.10+ and the Harvest REST collector
